page.title: 13Employment, New Galloway
page.content: Approximately 50% of the adult male population is involved in forestry, from planting to processing. There is a sawmill at Glenlee.10% are farmers. 9% work at the Galloway Hydro_electric Board and 8% are involved in tourism, i.e.Hotel owners and publicans. Another 3% work on the 2 Fish Farms, one at Kenmure and the other at Glenlee. 70% of the women interview are involved in tourism_ mostly in hotel work or caring for the holiday homes.10% work at the local knitwear factory and another 4% work in the local shops. Untilrecently, a small proportion of women worked in fish processing but the fish are now transported directly out of the area.
